description: Detects uncommon "conhost" child processes. This could be a sign of "conhost" usage as a LOLBIN or potential process injection activity.
author: omkar72
name: Uncommon Child Process Of Conhost.EXE
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\conhost.exe" AND (NOT ((Provider_Name:"SystemTraceProvider-Process") OR ((Provider_Name:"Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-Process" AND process.executable.text:"*\\git.exe" AND process.parent.command_line.text:("*\ show\ \-\-textconv\ *" OR "*\ cat\-file\ \-s\ *"))) OR ((process.parent.command_line.text:"*C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\conhost.exe\ 0x4*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ show\ \-\-textconv\ *" OR "*\ cat\-file\ \-s\ *"))) OR ((Provider_Name:"Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-Process" AND process.parent.command_line.text:("*\ cat\-file\ \-s\ *" OR "*show\ \-\-textconv*") AND process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\conhost.exe")) OR ((process.parent.command_line.text:(\\\?\?\\C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\conhost.exe 0x4 OR \\\?\?\\C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\conhost.exe 0xffffffff -ForceV1) AND process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\conhost.exe")) OR ((process.parent.command_line.text:(\\\?\?\\C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\conhost.exe 0xffffffff -ForceV1' OR \\\?\?\\C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\conhost.exe 0x4') AND process.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\Git\mingw64\bin\git.exe")))))
